thread.title: Woman Shot in Back Near Bushwick M Train Station, FDNY Says
thread.title_full: Woman Shot in Back Near Bushwick M Train Station, FDNY Says

title: Woman Shot in Back Near Bushwick M Train Station, FDNY Says
text:
Woman Shot in Back Near Bushwick M Train Station, FDNY Says By Heather Holland | March 1, 2017 5:36pm Twitter Facebook Email More 
BUSHWICK â€” A woman was shot in the back on Myrtle Avenue near the Knickerbocker Avenue M train station Wednesday, officials said. 
The 43-year-old victim was struck by the gunfire at 1397 Myrtle Ave., near Harman Street, around 4:26 p.m., police said. She appeared to be an unintended target, sources said. 
The woman was rushed to Elmhurst Hospital in stable condition, officials said. 
An employee at the Avon Beauty Center a block away on Myrtle Avenue said she heard four shots coming from outside but couldn't provide further details. 
Refresh this story for updates.
